about.name: Cancun
about.info_text: Cancun, a world-renowned destination located on the eastern coast of the Yucatan Peninsula in Mexico, is famous for its beautiful beaches, turquoise waters, and vibrant nightlife. It offers a mix of natural beauty, ancient Mayan history, and modern luxury. Visitors can enjoy the stunning beaches of the Hotel Zone, explore archaeological wonders like Chichen Itza, and experience the lively entertainment and cuisine of the city.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 628,306
State: Quintana Roo
Time Zone: Eastern Standard Time (UTC-05:00)
Language: Spanish
Currency: Mexican Peso (MXN)
about.climate_text: Cancun has a tropical climate with warm temperatures year-round. The dry season, from November to April, is the most popular time for tourists, while the wet season, from May to October, brings occasional rain and higher humidity.

attractions_card.title: Cancun Beaches
attractions_card.description: Cancun's beautiful beaches are famous for their white sand and crystal-clear waters. The Hotel Zone is lined with stunning beachfront resorts.

attractions_card.title: Chichen Itza
attractions_card.description: Chichen Itza is an ancient Mayan archaeological site known for the iconic El Castillo pyramid, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

attractions_card.title: Xcaret Park
attractions_card.description: Xcaret is a natural eco-park where visitors can swim in underground rivers, explore caves, and learn about Mexican culture and wildlife.

attractions_card.title: Isla Mujeres
attractions_card.description: Isla Mujeres is a beautiful island near Cancun, known for its pristine beaches, snorkeling opportunities, and vibrant town center.

attractions_card.title: Tulum
attractions_card.description: Tulum is another historic Mayan site located on the coast, offering ancient ruins with stunning ocean views.

attractions_card.title: Coco Bongo
attractions_card.description: Coco Bongo is a famous nightclub and entertainment venue known for its lively shows, music, and dance performances.

attractions_card.title: Isla Holbox
attractions_card.description: Isla Holbox is a tranquil island getaway where you can relax on the beach, swim with whale sharks, and enjoy the peaceful atmosphere.

attractions_card.title: Cenotes
attractions_card.description: The Yucatan Peninsula is dotted with cenotes, natural sinkholes filled with clear water, perfect for swimming and snorkeling.

food_card.title: Tacos
food_card.description: Tacos are a Mexican staple, and in Cancun, you can savor a variety of delicious tacos, from street vendors to upscale restaurants.

food_card.title: Ceviche
food_card.description: Ceviche, made with fresh seafood and lime juice, is a refreshing and popular dish in Cancun.

food_card.title: Tamales
food_card.description: Tamales, a traditional Mexican dish made of masa (dough) filled with meats, cheeses, and other ingredients, are a local favorite.

food_card.title: Aguas Frescas
food_card.description: Aguas frescas are refreshing fruit drinks made with water, fruit, and sugar, offering a sweet and cooling beverage.

food_card.title: Mole
food_card.description: Mole is a rich and flavorful sauce made from various ingredients, often served with chicken or turkey.

hotels_card.title: The Ritz-Carlton Cancun
hotels_card.description: The Ritz-Carlton in Cancun is a luxury beachfront resort offering elegant accommodations and exceptional service.

hotels_card.title: Hyatt Ziva Cancun
hotels_card.description: Hyatt Ziva is an all-inclusive resort with stunning ocean views, multiple dining options, and entertainment.

hotels_card.title: Secrets The Vine Cancun
hotels_card.description: Secrets The Vine is an adults-only resort known for its modern design, gourmet dining, and relaxing spa.

hotels_card.title: Iberostar Selection Cancun
hotels_card.description: Iberostar Selection is a family-friendly resort with multiple pools, a golf course, and various activities.

hotels_card.alt: Grand Fiesta Americana Coral Beach Cancun
hotels_card.title: Grand Fiesta Americana Coral Beach Cancun
hotels_card.description: The Grand Fiesta Americana offers luxurious accommodations and an expansive beachfront location.

transport_card.title: Cancun International Airport
transport_card.description: Cancun International Airport (CUN) is the main gateway to the city, serving both domestic and international flights.

transport_card.title: Cancun Buses
transport_card.description: Cancun has a public bus system that is an affordable and convenient way to get around the city and the Hotel Zone.

transport_card.title: Taxis
transport_card.description: Taxis are readily available in Cancun and are a convenient mode of transportation for getting around the area.

transport_card.title: Car Rentals
transport_card.description: Car rental agencies are available at the airport and throughout Cancun for those who want to explore the region at their own pace.
